<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thaumaturgic Ritualist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3711) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 44</row>

</column>

---

Your studies into the supernatural have resulted in an especially strong knowledge of [rituals](/Rules.aspx?ID=777). You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all primary checks to perform a ritual. You learn two [uncommon](/Traits.aspx?ID=159) [rituals](/rituals) with a level no higher than half your level; you must meet all prerequisites for casting the ritual to choose it. You can cast these as the primary caster, but you can't teach them to anyone else or allow someone else to serve as primary caster unless they know the ritual as well.

 At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, you learn another uncommon ritual with a level no higher than half your level and for which you meet the prerequisites.
name: Thaumaturgic Ritualist
